nodes.text: Home of Wisdom is an article written by August Hahn and Cynthia Hahn as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on March 25, 2004 and form of a meeting of the Tarasin leaders in the sacred Home of Wisdom called by Mother Dariana. Dariana had received a Force vision or "se'neth" regarding coming conflict in the Cularin system. Following this, the Tarasin began taking in Force sensitives from the Cularin population to protect them.
